verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* named \w Lazarus|strong="G2976"\w*, \w of|strong="G1537"\w* Bethany, \w was|strong="G1510"\w* lying ill; \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w belonged|strong="G1510"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w same|strong="G2532"\w* \w village|strong="G2968"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G3137"\w* sister \w Martha|strong="G3136"\w*.
